column1: Laguilayan - is a barangay (barrio) located 11 kilometers away from the Poblacion of Isulan
column2: Sultan Kudarat. It can be easily reached by passing the national road from Isulan to Cotabato city
column3: travelling about 7 kilometers is the provincial road westward direction at Crossing Dukay
column4: Esperanza leads to this scenic barangay.
